resources.string: Everyone begins drinking and each person cannot stop until the person to their left stops, however the person who drew this card may stop whenever they want
The person who drew this card picks someone else to drink
The person who drew this card must drink
Everyone points to the floor, the last person to do so must drink
Everyone points to the ceiling, the last person to do so must drink
Pick a person, and from now on, whenever you drink, they drink
Pick a word and go in a circle and rhyme a word with it. The first person who cannot must drink
Pick a category and go in a circle and name something that fits in that category. The first person who cannot do so must drink
Come on, you know what "Never Have I Ever" is.
Until the next queen is drawn, you are the Question Master. If you ask anyone a question and they answer it, they must drink
Make a rule that must be obeyed until the end of the game
Drink the beer in the middle of the table
Is this card higher or lower than the last one?
Is this card inside or outside of the last two?
Welcome to Bizkit! To start, everyone sit in a circle and roll the die, then move clockwise, until someone rolls a 7!
You are now the Bizkit! What is your name?
All players put a thumb on their forehead and say Bizkit.\n\nLast player to do so drinks and becomes the new Bizkit.
The person to the right of the roller drinks.
The person to the left of the roller drinks.

When the number \"3\" appears on the dice, the actual \"Biscuit\" has to take a drink. (If the dice show 3-3, the \"Biscuit\" has to take 2 drinks.) If the \"Biscuit\" does the number \"3\", his status of \"Biscuit\" is removed until another \"Biscuit\" is selected.

Called a \"challenge\". Roller chooses a player, that player must roll the dice. Add the result of each dice. The first roller has to make a higher result. If the first roller wins, the chosen player has to drink the difference between the 2 results. If the first roller failed, he has to drink the difference between the 2 results.
